title: Research-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program in Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Targeting current secondary education practitioners, this blended design aims to strengthen research-based problem-solving competencies in social studies, combining distributed learning via mobile environments with project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a research design process for analyzing social phenomena, divided into at least three stages.
Learners complete four or more 10-minute mini-projects proposing solutions to social issues using data collected in mobile environments.
Learners can self-assess research-based learning outcomes with over 80% accuracy based on peer evaluation and feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
